author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND PASSING WELL EAST OF BERMUDA HEADED TOWARD THE OPEN ATLANTIC WATERS...
summary: ...FERNAND PASSING WELL EAST OF BERMUDA HEADED TOWARD THE OPEN ATLANTIC WATERS... As of 11:00 AM AST Sun Aug 24 the center of Fernand was located near 31.0, -60.0 with movement NNE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND PASSING WELL EAST OF BERMUDA HEADED TOWARD THE OPEN ATLANTIC WATERS... As of 11:00 AM AST Sun Aug 24 the center of Fernand was located near 31.0, -60.0 with movement NNE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
